title: Essential Math Primer
description: 15-minute standalone lessons covering K-12 math concepts

lessons.title: What Numbers Are
lessons.description: Counting, place value foundation, number sense

lessons.title: Addition Basics
lessons.description: Strategies, mental math, building fluency

lessons.title: Subtraction & Inverse Relationships
lessons.description: Subtraction as inverse of addition, conceptual understanding

lessons.title: Multiplication Concept
lessons.description: Arrays, repeated addition, foundational multiplication

lessons.title: Division & Fair Sharing
lessons.description: Division as inverse of multiplication, fair sharing concept

lessons.title: Fractions as Parts
lessons.description: Halves, thirds, fourths, intuitive fraction understanding

lessons.title: Comparing & Ordering
lessons.description: Comparing numbers and fractions, ordering on number line

lessons.title: Introduction to Measurement
lessons.description: Length, time, money, standard units

lessons.title: Basic Geometry
lessons.description: Shapes, properties, perimeter, area basics

lessons.title: Word Problems Strategy
lessons.description: Translating English to math, problem-solving approach

lessons.title: Patterns & Sequences
lessons.description: Identifying and extending patterns, sequence basics

lessons.title: Data & Basic Graphing
lessons.description: Collecting data, pictographs, bar graphs, interpretation

lessons.title: Equivalent Fractions & Simplification
lessons.description: Equivalent fractions, reducing to lowest terms

lessons.title: Adding & Subtracting Fractions
lessons.description: Common denominators, operations with fractions

lessons.title: Multiplying & Dividing Fractions
lessons.description: Multiplication and division algorithms for fractions

lessons.title: Decimals & Place Value
lessons.description: Decimal notation, operations, relationship to fractions

lessons.title: Percentages
lessons.description: Percent concept, conversions, calculations

lessons.title: Ratios & Proportional Reasoning
lessons.description: Ratios, rates, proportions, direct relationships

lessons.title: Integers & Operations with Negatives
lessons.description: Negative numbers, integer operations, number line

lessons.title: Introduction to Variables
lessons.description: Variables as unknown quantities, basic notation

lessons.title: Solving Simple Equations
lessons.description: Two-step equations, inverse operations, balance method

lessons.title: Order of Operations
lessons.description: PEMDAS, sequence of operations, evaluation

lessons.title: Exponents & Powers
lessons.description: Exponential notation, properties of exponents, powers of 10

lessons.title: Square Roots & Radicals
lessons.description: Square roots, radical notation, perfect squares intro

lessons.title: Graphing Ordered Pairs
lessons.description: Coordinate plane, ordered pairs, plotting points

lessons.title: Introduction to Functions
lessons.description: Function concept, input-output, function notation

lessons.title: Linear Relationships
lessons.description: Linear patterns, constant rate, introduction to linear functions

lessons.title: Linear Equations
lessons.description: Slope-intercept, point-slope, standard form

lessons.title: Graphing Linear Functions
lessons.description: Graphing lines, slope interpretation, transformations

lessons.title: Systems of Linear Equations
lessons.description: Solving systems, graphical and algebraic methods

lessons.title: Slope & Rate of Change
lessons.description: Slope concept, rate of change, secant lines

lessons.title: Polynomials & Terminology
lessons.description: Polynomial definitions, degree, standard form

lessons.title: Factoring Techniques
lessons.description: GCF, trinomials, special products, factoring

lessons.title: Quadratic Equations - Conceptual
lessons.description: Quadratic concept, parabolas, roots, vertex

lessons.title: Solving Quadratics
lessons.description: Factoring, quadratic formula, completing the square

lessons.title: Function Notation & Composition
lessons.description: Function notation, evaluation, composition of functions

lessons.title: Inverse Functions
lessons.description: Inverse concept, finding inverses, properties

lessons.title: Exponential Functions & Growth
lessons.description: Exponential models, exponential growth/decay, e

lessons.title: Logarithms
lessons.description: Logarithms as inverse of exponentials, properties, evaluation

lessons.title: Rational Expressions & Equations
lessons.description: Simplifying, operations, solving rational equations

lessons.title: Sequences - Arithmetic
lessons.description: Arithmetic sequences, common difference, formulas

lessons.title: Sequences - Geometric
lessons.description: Geometric sequences, common ratio, formulas

lessons.title: Right Triangle Trigonometry
lessons.description: Sine, cosine, tangent, right triangle applications

lessons.title: Unit Circle & Angle Measure
lessons.description: Unit circle, radians, degrees, angle measurement

lessons.title: Basic Trigonometric Functions
lessons.description: Sine, cosine, tangent as functions, graphs, properties

lessons.title: Probability Fundamentals
lessons.description: Probability rules, independent/dependent events, counting

lessons.title: Statistics & Distributions
lessons.description: Mean, median, mode, standard deviation, normal distribution

lessons.title: Correlation vs. Causation
lessons.description: Relationship analysis, correlation coefficient, inference

lessons.title: Scientific Notation
lessons.description: Writing very large and small numbers efficiently using powers of 10

lessons.title: Introduction to Inequalities
lessons.description: Understanding inequality symbols, solving one-step inequalities, number line representation

lessons.title: Percent Applications
lessons.description: Tax, tip, discount, and markup calculations in real-world contexts

lessons.title: Why Division by Zero is Undefined
lessons.description: Understanding why dividing by zero breaks mathematics and what 'undefined' means

lessons.title: Why We 'Flip and Multiply' for Fraction Division
lessons.description: The conceptual reason behind the reciprocal rule for dividing fractions

lessons.title: Distance Formula
lessons.description: Finding distance between two points using coordinates and the Pythagorean theorem

lessons.title: Combining Like Terms & Distributive Property
lessons.description: Simplifying expressions by combining terms and distributing multiplication

lessons.title: Simple Interest
lessons.description: Calculating interest using I = PRT formula for loans and savings

lessons.title: Compound Interest
lessons.description: Understanding compound interest and exponential growth in finance

lessons.title: PEMDAS Pitfalls
lessons.description: Common mistakes with order of operations and left-to-right evaluation

lessons.title: Absolute Value Equations
lessons.description: Solving equations with absolute value and understanding distance interpretation

lessons.title: Line of Best Fit & Linear Regression
lessons.description: Finding trend lines for scatter plot data and making predictions

lessons.title: Combinations & Permutations
lessons.description: Counting principles for ordered and unordered arrangements

lessons.title: Conditional Probability
lessons.description: Probability of events given that another event has occurred

lessons.title: Mean vs Median: When to Use Which
lessons.description: Choosing appropriate measures of center based on data distribution

lessons.title: Function Transformations
lessons.description: Shifts, stretches, reflections, and compressions of function graphs

lessons.title: Rational Functions & Asymptotes
lessons.description: Understanding functions with polynomial ratios and their asymptotic behavior

lessons.title: Rational Exponents
lessons.description: Connecting fractional exponents to radicals and root operations

lessons.title: Introduction to Complex Numbers
lessons.description: The imaginary unit i, complex number operations, and why they exist

lessons.title: Law of Sines
lessons.description: Solving non-right triangles using sine ratios and side-angle relationships

lessons.title: Law of Cosines
lessons.description: Using the generalized Pythagorean theorem for any triangle

lessons.title: Arc Length & Sector Area
lessons.description: Calculating arc lengths and areas of circle sectors using radians

lessons.title: Sigma Notation & Finite Series
lessons.description: Summation notation and finding sums of arithmetic and geometric series

lessons.title: Estimation & Reasonableness
lessons.description: Developing number sense to check if answers make sense in context

lessons.title: Box Plots & Interquartile Range
lessons.description: Five-number summary, box-and-whisker plots, and measuring spread with IQR

lessons.title: Area vs Perimeter Confusion
lessons.description: Common mistakes mixing up area and perimeter and when to use each

lessons.title: Community Choice Topic
lessons.description: Reserved for highest-requested topic from community feedback
